name: Cult Chaos
description:
Please don't play this game. I am disgusted at the monstrosity of a "game" I have created. Literally don't play it, please. I am sorry for making this. Also if you are stuck, click on the cat pancake-looking thing for help. 

There are 3 mini-games:

- Email Shooter (Click at enemies to shoot emails at them)

- Coin Vineyard (Use WASD or arrow keys to move basket to collect falling coins)

- Cult Prep Maze (Use WASD or arrow keys to collect necessary items to prepare for a cult gathering

Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2zAUC9_PAu5BW_sNX3zXiA
